O

OnActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.Login
When exit button pressed, exit the application main screen window and close the database connection
onAddAppointmentClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
Users are taken to the add appointments screen.
onAddCustomerClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
Users are taken to the add customers screen.
onBackClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.Report
Users are taken back to the mainscreen.
onCancelClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.AddAppointment
Discard the appointment to be added and takes the user back to the mainscreen.
onCancelClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.AddCustomer
Discard the customer to be added and takes the user back to the mainscreen.
onCancelClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.ModifyAppointment
Discard the changes to the appointment to be modified and takes the user back to the mainscreen.
onCancelClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.ModifyCustomer
Discard the changes to the customer to be modified and takes the user back to the mainscreen.
onDeleteAppointmentClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
The main screen is updated after an appointment is selected to be removed.
onDeleteCustomerClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
The main screen is updated after a customer is selected to be removed.
onLoginClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.Login
Validates the user login credentials and allowing the user to see the mainscreen if the username and password are valid within the database.
onLogoutClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
Logout the user and take them back to the login screen.
onReportClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
Take the user to the reports screen.
onSaveClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.AddAppointment
Users will be prompted to add various fields of information when creating an appointment.
onSaveClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.AddCustomer
Input from the user (minus a customer ID which will be automatically generated) will be added as a record in the database.
onSaveClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.ModifyAppointment
Users will be shown various fields of information that can be changed.
onSaveClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.ModifyCustomer
The customer information being updated will be saved and updated in the database.
onUpdateAppointmentClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
Users are taken to the update appointments screen.
onUpdateCustomerClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
Users are taken to the update customers screen.
onUpdateTimesClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class ehubicka.Controller.MainScreen
For updating the times located in the bottom right corner of the mainscreen (as they don't update automatically).
openConnection() - Static method in class ehubicka.Database.JDBC
Open the connection to the database used only when launching the application.
